summary: A high school student whose father and sister were recently murdered begins her own investigation after two of her fellow cheerleaders are kidnapped. She sets out on a rescue mission, but the killer may already be hot on her trail.
cast: Samantha Boscarino|Irene Chiang|Devin Crittenden|Nancy Degnan|David DeSantos|Saige Donaldson|Joshua Elizondo|Eric Etebari|Nigel Gibbs|Dylan Scott Gilligan|David Hill|Michelle Joyner|Hannah Kasulka|Karen Lancaster|Bryan Lawrence|Amanda Leighton|Austin Lyon|Holly Maag|Annie Monroe|Emilyrose Morris|Silas Orteza|Jim Pirri|Juan Rodriguez|Roberto William Romero|Tessie Santiago|David Rees Snell|Hanna Stein|Henderson Wade|Sydney Walsh|Chelsea Zhang
title: Tragedia en las aulas
